content: the 1st double_crochet cut yarn and join shrimp in next chain space round 7 as round 5 cut yarn and join soft peach in the space between shells round 8 as round 6 cut yarn and join sage in next chain space round 9 as round 5 cut yarn and join storm blue in the space between shells round 10 as round 6 cut yarn and join pale rose in next chain space round 11 as round 5 cut yarn and join grape in the space between shells round 12 as round 6 cut yarn and join claret in next chain space round 13 as round 5 round 14 1ch 1dc in same place **3ch skip shell *1dc in next space 3ch skip shell * repeat from * to * up to corner space 1dc 2ch 1dc in corner space ** repeat from ** to ** to start of the round slip_stitch into the top of the 1st double_crochet cut yarn finishing weave in any remaining ends if needed block gently using the steam only from a hot iron to relax the fibres slightly or follow the recommendations for the yarn you are using a sandra paul/cherry heart original design © copyright 2018 all rights reserved page 5 of 1 0 this pattern remains the property of sandra paul/cherry heart designs at all times and is for your own personal use only please respect my work and do not copy reproduce redistribute or re-sell this pattern for more copyright information please see www cherryheart co uk/p/copyright cherry heart designs 0 yarn colour requirements this table shows a breakdown of all the colours i used in my blanket and the number of balls of stylecraft special dk used i ve also marked how many squares are made in each colour and indicated which colours were used for the wider row in the border ball quantity stylecraft special dk no of squares 1 1003 -
